description: Hanging belay on Murchison Falls? Two nautical miles offshore in a drysuit? Vile music festival port-a-potty? Carry this device and go with impunity.Made of polypropylene recyclable plastic.Fully sufficient 7.5in outlet pipe with impressive 1.4in. girth for good flow and directional accuracy.Includes a discreet storage case in dainty pink or camo green.
name: Shewee Extreme Urinating Device - Women's
